name: Observatory
text: When your action is drawing a card, draw 3 instead of 2, choose one and rsicard the rest.

name: Ghost house
text: This card is of any color when you count final score.

name: Lab
text: Once a turn you can discard a card to get 1 Gold.

name: Cemetery
text: When Warlord destroys a building, you can spend 1 Gold to get this card to your hand.

name: Magic School
text: This card is of any color when you collect money.

name: Library
text: When you draw cards, keep both.

name: Forge
text: Once a turn you can spend 2 Gold to draw 3 cards.

name: Great Wall
text: Warlord must spend 1 more Gold to destroy your buildings.
